title: Milan Ružić
text:
Milan Ružić (25 July 1955 in <a href="Rijeka">Rijeka</a>, <a href="Socialist%20Federal%20Republic%20of%20Yugoslavia">Yugoslavia</a> – 25 January 2014 in Rijeka, <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>) was a Croatian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player. He was capped twice for <a href="Yugoslavia%20national%20football%20team">Yugoslavia</a>.
<a href="NK%20Kraljevica">NK Kraljevica</a> changed the name of their stadium "Oštro" to Stadium "Milan Ružić - Minta" in his honour in August 2015.
